blog.name: greatduwangs
blog.title: fighting gold
blog.description: Duwangs // 19 // Mainblog.principeaureo - Giorno RP blog.  Follows/likes made on this account.

summary: ok yknow what its been almost a year now and fuck rian johnson and fuck lucasfilms and fuck kathleen kennedy and fuck the last...
body:
ok yknow what its been almost a year now and fuck rian johnson and fuck lucasfilms and fuck kathleen kennedy and fuck the last jedi for everything they did to luke skywalker.  fuck what they did to mark hamill, fuck them for turning one of the most inspiring, courageous, KIND heroes in a children’s film franchise into that bitter shadow.  fuck them for even daring to send a message so lazily written and cynical with a generic, boring “HOPE” cliche haphazardly slapped on the back for no reason.

fuck rian johnson, for not listening to anyone, for pulling this crap, and fuck this entire movie.  

the fans deserved better than this.  luke skywalker deserved better than this.  mark hamill deserved better than this.

fuck rian johnson, for not listening to anyone, for pulling this crap, and fuck this entire movie.  

the fans deserved better than this.  luke skywalker deserved better than this.  mark hamill deserved better than this.

the fans deserved better than this.  luke skywalker deserved better than this.  mark hamill deserved better than this.

title: A Single Dark Hair
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2NI9IE7

by Cohava

Kinktober Day #10 (I did say I was late)

Prompts: Hair-pulling and Bonds (Telepathic or Empathic)

Rey closed the door, but the Force Bond still works. Neither of them is willing to come to the other’s side, so what’s left to do but have angsty Force Sex and discover new kinks in the meantime?

Words: 1007, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Star Wars - All Media Types
  • Rating: Explicit
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Categories: F/M
  • Characters: Rey, Ben Solo | Kylo Ren
  • Relationships: Rey/Ben Solo | Kylo Ren
  • Additional Tags: Hair-pulling, Bonds (Telepathic or Empathic), Kinktober 2018, Angst, the angst got away from me, if they can touch fingers they can touch other things, this IS how the force works, Cunnilingus, Force Cunnilingus, no regrets folks, author is very late on her prompts, Enemies in love, Post TLJ

title: Damerey Week - Day 2
body:
X'us'R'iia

Prompt: Warm

Rating: E

Word Count: 5725

Poe and Rey take a side trip during a mission to Jakku. What could possibly go wrong?

Read it on Ao3

title: Homecoming
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2J1scP0

by greyone01

Almost two decades ago, Poe Dameron left Yavin 4 bright-eyed and ready to face whatever the Galaxy has in store for him. He returns not as a glorious hero with awesome and inspiring tales to tell, but as a haunted and wounded soldier retreating to the sanctuary where he hopes to be un-broken.

Day 2 of Damerey Week 2018

Words: 917, Chapters: 1/3, Language: English

Series: Part 7 of Damerey Week 2018

  • Fandoms: Star Wars - All Media Types, Star Wars Sequel Trilogy
  • Rating: General Audiences

  • Relationships: Poe Dameron/Rey
  • Additional Tags: damereyweek, DameRey, JediPilot, Poe Dameron Needs A Hug, Rey Needs A Hug, Poe Dameron Hurts So Prettily

blog.name: ao3feed--reylo
blog.title: Reylo AO3 Feed
blog.description:
This blog automatically posts links to AO3 fics containing the Rey/Kylo Ren tag.
Avatar by @panda-capuccino

title: Without Words
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2pT1zTO

by SpaceTravels

Rey sighed a little huff of breath, uncertain of what to do. They had ignored each other for weeks as the Force connected them, and each had attempted to go about whatever they were doing at the moment. Sometimes Kylo was in the midst of a discussion with his inferiors, and Rey was in the underbelly of a ship with tools in hand. Other times she was training with Finn, her saberstaff pitted against Finn’s melee weapon, while Kylo meditated on the Force. It really was a useless exercise to ignore each other though, as each was hyperaware of the other - down to each small breath, every subtle movement and even their thoughts. Yet still, they had not spoken a word to each other.

In this third instalment of the series, Rey and Kylo continue to be joined by their Force Bond. As hard as they fight their connection, it really could only lead them to one place…

Words: 2143, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

Series: Part 3 of Ways of Coming Together

  • Fandoms: Star Wars Sequel Trilogy, Star Wars - All Media Types, Episode VII: The Force Awakens, Episode VIII: The Last Jedi
  • Rating: Mature
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Categories: F/M
  • Characters: Rey (Star Wars), Kylo Ren, Ben Solo | Kylo Ren, Poe Dameron, Finn (Star Wars), Leia Organa, Chewbacca (Star Wars), Lando Calrissian, Armitage Hux
  • Relationships: Kylo Ren/Rey, Rey/Ben Solo | Kylo Ren, Rey & Ben Solo | Kylo Ren
  • Additional Tags: Enemies to Friends to Lovers, Romance, Angst with a Happy Ending, Fluff and Angst, Fluff and Smut


read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2pT1zTO
